name: WP Sliding Login/Dashboard Panel
author: Fay√ßal Tirich

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to add a sliding login/dashboard panel to any WordPress Theme. This awesome panel is based on http://web-kreation.com/index.php/tutorials/nice-clean-sliding-login-panel-built-with-jquery/

Instead of modifying directly theme files, just install this plugin so you can preserve you panel when switching between themes (or after themes updates).

You can also specify your own HTML content to put in the panel… Yes! this is awesome!
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-sliding-logindashboard-panel to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Can I use it with another javascript library ?

No, only Jquery is supported
sections.changelog:
2.1

Introducing CodeCanyon profile

2.0

  • Admin can specify his own HTML content tu put in the sliding panel

1.0

  • First release with no bug detected

short_description: Automatically add a sliding login/dashboard (or whatever HTML content) to your Wordpress Theme
